choices: Mr. Honda, the leader of Speed Delivery
1.content:
So which character from the group are we gonna focus on in this size changing story? I know, nothing original here with the characters choices already been revealed, but I figure you can review it on this page.

https://www.writing.com/main/interactive...
1.title: Which character to focus on?

11.content:
It was another boring and typical day for Ami Okada, the delivery girl for the Speed Delivery fast food joint. Daisuke Uryuu is as lazy as he can be, dealing orders to her when given the chance at every turn, and is usually the boss around there when Mr. Honda away. She usually ends up trekking around the city, making delivery orders to various customers around town that need food. Her life seemingly is going nowhere at the moment. Her parents were finally struggling to meet ends meet, so she ended up dropping off of high school and getting her job full time to help out with paying rent. She wanted to finished high school, but her situation at the time made her unable to do that. She dreamed of one day writing her own manga to help her parents, who are supportive of her despite everything, as they are family.

Right now, we see Ami Okada, currently at the restaurant getting ready for another set of deliveries. She was loading up the food onto her car so where she can go to make the deliveries. She actually had a few addresses to go to. One of those orders is Haruka Tatomi, a famous actress for being a giant monster in the movies, and Ami is a fan of her surprisingly despite her being a kid. Guess she needs some good food for her to do her city smashing or defending job in the movies.

There was also her friend Lily Okna, a friend of Ami's also, a Japanese modeling lady who's rich parents own some major businesses, and she currently is modeling at the town, and has ordered some food for herself. Perhaps a salad maybe, maybe she could end up going there to visit for a bit if its not for the many orders she has to make.

There was also Toshio, a young 6 year old boy and his parents who are also rich and do various toy businesses. The much less sad about the trouble making boy, the better, but apparently the family has ordered a good meal, so perhaps head to him.

There is also Sayama Kaiai, another friend of Ami as well who she befriended during her years at high school. Ami was always a bit jealous of her sexy body, though Ami does have a fairly good one for herself, but she was a good heart friend. She was currently at home right now when she made the order, so perhaps she can go there first.

Then there is Old Man Matou, and nothing much is known about him, except he is pretty crazy and well, supposedly he lives in a bit of a dump of a place. Perhaps head there possibly to see him and give him his meal.

https://www.writing.com/main/interactive... (references to all characters here)

So where does she head first for her deliveries?
11.title: Ami Okada, the delivery girl

choices: He is gonna test it on himself to see if it works (shrinks)
He is gonna test it on himself to see if it works (grows)
He tests it on someone else (shrinks)
He tests it on someone else (grows)
He is gonna send it to a unsuspecting person via package
14.content:
They were many rumors of the person named Matou, but everyone usually just calls him completely crazy and delusional. Why you might ask? You see, he is a crazed scientist who wanted to invention a size changing ray in order to end world hunger and help control population, well that is a good starter, as he went to college and got several scientific degrees in the process. That would be enough for him to be very well in life well, that is where the positives end. You see, he was so focused on his experiments and how ludicrous that they are that his wife ultimately end up leaving him when he was just like 40-50 years as he was so crazy. It was also reported he was having affairs and all of them involve size fetishes, to where his wife was disgusted with it.

Matou always wanted to see how sizes can be so arousing, like when someone is small, or if someone is big, that is what he wanted to do, and he has watched old scientist movies, and monster movies, to get that understanding. As he watched them, he became more aroused, and was so demented that he decided to become even more focused on his experiments, and he just leaves anything out of his responsibility.

Many would hear him talking about sizes and other strange fetishes when he is around, so they avoided him. Some even hated his mental strangeness so much that they prank his house by breaking in and stealing stuff. Breaking his devices, and even one point set it on fire. But this crazy scientist never gave up at all, and soon all of his work would pay off. One day a strange power source came from somewhere, and he grabbed it and placed it in his device, and then.... he predictably said.

"It is finished, the size remote is done!" he said, just as his famous remote with the G and S buttons, with a few additional buttons for good measure. He then turned and fired it on a random item and hit S. A strange beam was then fired from the tip of the remote, and it hit the item, causing it to vanished. The scientist then grabbed a magnifying glass to see if it shrunk, and he saw he shrunk a chair. "It is perfect. Now, let's see what happens when I hit G." he said, and then he hits the G button, and surprise, it grew again.

"NOW, REVENGE SHALL BE MINE, I HAVE SPENT YEARS TRYING TO MAKE MY SIZE REMOTE, AND NOW IT IS DONE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" he laughed evilly, and then he decided to.
14.title: Revenge Shall Be Mine

choices: The young boys in the playground
144.content:
Old Man Matou would surely has his revenge soon enough. He has always been a fan of giant monster movies, so perhaps with his size remote, he could grow some unsuspecting person or animals in order for them to have their own fun onto the city. He can just watch the mayhem and see Tokyo get destroyed, and not have to take any blame for it at all from the police. It was genius, just grow someone or an animal and have them destroy the city unknowingly or just watch the fun play out on how they grew big or what not.

With that said, Old Man Matou then got out of the house and then started to walk around the street, with everyone just going around with their day as usual, he then notices a few people he could test the growth remote on, well for this occasion.

The first group of people is several teenage school girls who were just coming back from school. Easy for perv shots for any perverts given that they can look up their skirts really easy, perhaps he could get some really big panty shots in the process and sell them on the internet for some big bucks.

Another group is some young kids, all young boys were playing around the playground like the kids that they are. Surely they were having fun just playing the swing sets and what not, but he wonder what would happen if those boys were to grow big. He could see them really acting like giant monsters then and there. In fact, out of the group he could do that easily.

So which group will he grow?
144.title: Looking for test subjects to grow

choices: Kimiko getting King-Sized! Device not quite perfected! Growth spurts incoming

15.title: More characters option

choices: The film producers, wanting to discuss a movie with her
Her parents, coming by to visit her
A delivery person, with the size remote inside
152.content:
Don’t let the young age of Haruka Tatomi fool you my friend. She is a superstar in Japan. (While this story is set in 1985, this is fictional so expect made up stuff here). This young actress has worked in the film industry for several years now, and even in the television world as well, but one thing we all know for sure that we love about this girl, she loves acting big.

That is what she has done for most of her roles, being able to stand tall in a miniature city, either protecting it or destroying it like a gleeful little girl that she is, it is always a fascination that she has gotten since her parents were also famous actors in many movies in Japan. However, Haruka is a special case as she likes doing big roles. Most roles for her has her being some sort of towering giant, where it is just for her being a friendly giant in a village wearing a ancient suit, or even the silly commercials of her being in a swimsuit for promoting products, she always love standing big in a miniature city.

She has watched many monster movies, specifically Godzilla, and all of those cool Ultraman shows, always wanting to get an idea of how those actors interact on those sets of miniature cities, and one day she got to do that at the age of 6. It was a simple role, she was simply destroying the city. The director loved how she smashed the city with her hands and feet, and while she acted like a big menacing giantess, roaring and stomping onto the scene, but it is where she got her passion.

Obviously she was homeschool and had tutors on her set to keep up with her school work, but she doesn’t mind as she does take her studies seriously, so she an get back to her favorite thing she likes doing, finding roles for her to act like a giantess. She was right now resting in her trailer lot when suddenly the door knocks. Haruka then got up, and went over to the door to see it was.
152.title: The Monster Child Actress

choices: Haruka brings the remote with her on set
Haruka leaves the remote in her trailer for later
Haruka uses the remote on herself right now
1523.content:
"Package for Ms. Tatomi!" the deliver boy said.

Haruka eyed him with tired eyes but a bright smile nonetheless. He appeared to be holding a small box addressed to her. It was probably a fan sending her a gift, she loved when that happened. It was one of those things outside of fan mail and guest appearances that let her know she was doing a really good job in the roles she's given.

"Thank you." she continued to smile to the deliver boy as she graciously accepted the package.

"You're welcome." he smiled back. He then began to get a little nervous. "Excuse me, Ms. Tatomi…"

"Yes?"

"Umm. If it's not too much trouble could I get your autograph." He asked before extending a pen and a piece of paper. "It's just that my little sister is a huge fan and wants to be a great actress like you some day."

"Really? Of course I'll sign." Haruka said with glistening eyes. She gently put down the package before signing her name.

"Thank you." the deliver bowed before running off.

Haruka watched him go before taking her package inside. It was a little brown box addressed to her from someone named Matou. She didn't know any Matou so they must be a new fan. She loved making new fans.

"Okay, let's see what's inside." she said to herself before tearing open the cardboard. Inside was an even smaller white box wrapped in bubble-wrap. Of course she took a few minutes to pop the bubble-wrap. It was just so fun to pop. Once that was finished she finally opened the white box to reveal... "A remote?"

A remote. A small grey remote that looked like it went to one of her great grandpa's T.Vs. What was she supposed to do with this? It was then she noticed the "G" and "S" buttons along with a few numbers and dials. Not thinking much of it, she pressed the "S" button and watched as a yellow beam fired from the remote and at her chair.

Her eyes went wide as she watched her custom made chair vanish before her very eyes. "W-What?" It was gone. Her chair was gone! What just happened. She looked back at the remote and then back to the spot where her chair had been. She watched the spot carefully and noticed a small black dot against her yellow carpet.

She bent down to get a better look and what she saw let her shocked. It was her chair. It was so... tiny. How!? Was it, the remote. She looked back at the device and the two large buttons. If "S" made it shrink than "G" would...

She pressed the button and watched as a red beam fired and in a flash her chair was back to normal. "No way."

Was she dreaming? She pinched her self to make sure. The pain she felt told her she was in fact very much awake. She ran back to the box with the name Matou on it. They were now officially her number one fan.

Before she could do anything else she heard a knock on her trailer door. "Ms. Tatomi, It's Rei. We need you on set."

"I'll be right there!" she called as she stared at the remote.
1523.title: A Strange Package

choices: "Me as a giant monster hero defending the city (still acts like a kaiju, good)"
"Me as the giant monster, wrecking the city to pieces (evil)"
"Me trying to live life at the size of a giant monster, (neutral)"
15232.content:
"I will set this for the time being and get ready, besides, already about to shoot a monster show." she said to herself just as she sets the remote off to the side on a table and got into her usual dress for the show. She was then soon off to the set. She is currently shooting some sort of monster show for the company, and of course she is playing the usual large girl. But with that remote, she could end up doing so much more, perhaps even grow herself to the monster heights of her shows and what not and become a real monster.

Eventually she got onto the set, where it is a miniature city that was developed to scale with Haruka's height. She is supposedly kaiju height to the buildings, and just as she enters onto the set to observe the tiny cars and buildings, the director then came in and greeted her.

"Hey there, I assume that you like the set we made for the giant monster like you." the director smiled, as he enjoyed working with Haruka. Being a tokusatsu director, it was his job to make the shows that feature big special effects, and with her fans being adored by her work, this easily play into his favor.

"Say, curious to know what we are doing to be doing for this new show?" the director asked her. "Its the one that you wanted to produce yourself."

"Yeah, I am making this series myself, and I know what it is going to be about, it features...."

(this next choice will decide what alignment Haruka will be when she grows into a giantess)
15232.title: Haruka leaves the remote in her trailer for later

choices: Skip to the end of production for the day
152321.content:
"Say, curious to know what we are doing to be doing for this new show?" the director asked her. "Its the one that you wanted to produce yourself."

"Yeah, I am making this series myself, and I know what it is going to be about, it features me as a giant monster her defending the city!"

Haruka couldn't help but strike a heroic pose from one of her earlier works. Oh how good it would feel to strike it when she turned into a true monster heroine.

The director and a few of the production crew began to chuckle at Haruka's antics. The girl was an absolute darling to be around. It was nice to know some actors were truly who they said they were.

"Anyways, Ms. Tatomi--"

"Please call me Haruka. Everyone does." the child star interrupted.

"Alright then Ms. Haruka. I just wanted know since this is a giant monster heroine story, what monster of the week would you like to do battle against?"

"Hmm?" Haruka wondered as she placed a hand to her chin. "I could fight an alien... but then again giant robots are really cool too."

Again, the director couldn't help but chuckle.

"How about..."
152321.title: Giant Monster Heroine

choices: Haruka does the scene as planned
Haruka goes back to her trailer for the size gun
1523212.content:
"How about the giant robot." Haruka finally decided. Yeah, a giant robot would be perfect for an opening enemy. After all what was more evil than a bunch of tin cans bent on taking over the world? If the success of that Terminator movie over in America was anything to go by then she'd made the perfect choice.

"Ah, that sounds like an excellent choice." The director smiled. "Especially since the commercial success of that techno noire film over in America. What was it called again... the Terminator?"

"That's it! That's the one!" Haruka confirmed. "There's nothing more scary than giant hunks of metal with glowing red eyes, metal claws, and huge lasers!"

The director loved the little actress's enthusiasm. "Well it sounds to me you made the perfect choice!"

Haruka nodded. She really did, and once this shoot was over she could focus on her new size ray and real giant monster battles.

The director grabbed his megaphone and began to bark out orders. "ALL RIGHT EVERYONE, PLACES! I WANT TO SEE IF WE CAN GET THIS ALL DONE IN ONE TAKE!"

Everyone began to scramble to their assignments as Haruka made her way onto the set. She loved the feeling of being in model cities. It made her feel tall. Not to mention there was just something oh so satisfying about standing head and shoulders above buildings and model civilians.

The director took his seat, "WHERE THE HECK IS MADO!? HE'S SUPPOSED TO BE OUR MONSTER/STUNTMAN!"

As if on que the sight of a metal frame walked onto set. Well it wasn't real metal, not entirely. The suit Mado was wearing was made out of foam and tubes that were spray painted and decorated to look like metal. The only real metal on this thing was the iron chest plate and the steel around the helmet. A helmet that was apparently wired to have the eyes glow.

All in all if anyone was rating the suit it would be a solid 8 out of 10. Not bad for an all practical costume. Take that cheap computer generated visuals.

"Hiya mister Mado." Haruka greeted.

"Ready to do battle against the mechanical terror of Mechabolico!?" Mado joked.

Haruka smiled. "Sure! I'm gonna defeat the Skynet and save the day!"

"ALRIGHT EVERYONE, LET'S DO THIS RIGHT, 3... 2... 1... ACTION!"
1523212.title: The Metal Menace

15233.content:
Haruka couldn’t believe it with her own eyes. The remote can grow and shrink objects, but now a new thought was coming to her own head, what if she could grow herself to be the heights of the monsters that she has always dreamed about? Well with that, she decides to finally do that dream for real.

She then turns the remote and uses it to hit herself with the G button. The laser fires and soon it hits herself and engulfs her in the red beam. She held it for a few more moments just as she takes in on the surge of energy that is starting to course her veins.

At that point, the crew man knocked on the door again asking. “Are you okay in there? I hope you are alright, as we got a bit of a shoot today, just wanting to be sure you are on the set shortly.” The crew man said just as he see the top of the trailer burst right open, revealing to see a giant head of Haruka coming right out. Suddenly the rest of the trailer bursted all around just as the man ran out of there. Soon the trailer was completely gone, and as it went out, Haruka grew bigger and bigger, clothes all in tact. Everyone on the set started to take notice and several even panicked and ran away, soon she was at the height of?
15233.title: Time to become a real monster

choices: Haruka wants to grow some friends
152333.content:
Soon, Haruka stopped growing at a massive 200ft tall. She easily towered over everything in the entire movie and TV studio set, and none of the buildings couldn’t even come up to her knee in that area at all. Haruka was just now started to take notice of how everything is so small to her now, and how all of the people are now running for their live screaming after seeing her tower over the set, but it seems that remote much more real than ever. It made her grew to 200ft tall for real. A true kaiju height!

“Wow, I couldn’t believe it, this thing works like a charm, I am a true kaiju now, I AM NOW GIRLZILLA!!!!!!!!!” Haruka cheered out to the heavens with her cute voice before giving out a cute monster like roar. She then started to move and then proceed to stomp some smaller sets with her feet. She then noticed the sets being destroyed, and she then smiles some more. “I always liked playing monster, so I will play some more monster now!” She smiled just as she stomps all over the sets, destroying everything in site with her powerful stomps. Everyone was now in a frenzy, even the directors who worked with her, as they were all trying to escape her wrath. She then turns to them and gives out a monster like roar just as she taunts them. “Thanks for the monster career, as now I got bigger plans, I am gonna really enjoy the kaiju life now.”

With that statement, Haruka escapes the set location and sets her set on Tokyo, who will soon feel her wrath.

/

In an unknown location in Tokyo, a man was watching TV and saw the news report of a giant girl in Tokyo, specifically the monster actress Haruka. The old man smiled. “Now that is my girl, let the destruction commence.”

What happens now?
152333.title: Girlzilla is Born

info.brief_description: A size changing story. Not very original. Have fun though :)
info.description:
Summary: Ami was a typical food delivery girl living in 1985 Japan until one day she made a delivery that would change her life forever.
-------
Cast:
-------
Protagonist: Ami Okada (5'2")
Age: 19
Sex: Female
Appearance: A fair-skinned woman with long blue hair and deep blue eyes. Her work attire consists of a white short-sleeved button shirt with blue short-shorts and open-toed sandals, complete with a company apron.
Occupation: Fast Food (Delivery Girl)
Background: A high-school dropout who still lives at home and who's life's not really going anywhere. She got a job at 'Speed Delivery' to pay her rent at home and have some pocket change. Her dream is to eventually write her own manga one day. Her favorite manga is currently Fist of the North Star.

Name: Daisuke Uryuu (5'5")
Age: 21
Sex: Male
Appearance: Plain looking male with messy black hair and dark eyes. He's often seen wearing a typical school uniform as he attends college while also working at 'Speed Delivery'.
Occupation: Fast Food (Cashier)
Background: A college student looking to make it big as a doctor. What kind of doctor he won't say. To keep himself stable he got a job at 'Speed Delivery' and is considered the boss when the owner's away. He can also be quite Lazy at times. Plus he like to dish out orders to Ami when given the opportunity.

Name: Mr. Honda (5'9")
Age: 40
Sex: Male
Appearance: An older looking man with dark hair and grayish sides. He typically wears a white shirt and black pants, complete with a chefs hat and apron.
Occupation: Fast Food (Owner/Chef/Janitor)
Background: Speed Delivery is a business run by Mr. Honda's family since the 1930s. It's not the richest or biggest establishment but he's managed to keep the lights on. Currently he could only afford two employees so he does most of the work. The backbreaking labor keeps him in shape. He also occasionally brings the wife and kids to the workplace.

Name: Old Man Matou (5'11"}
Age: 80
Sex: Male
Appearance: An elderly man with crazy white hair and a long grey beard. His casual attire consists of a burgundy sweater overtop a long-sleeved button down shirt and khakis.
Occupation: Unemployed (Supposedly a some sort of inventor or professor)
Background: Not much is known about the old man except that he's crazy and lives alone. Rumor's have it that his wife left him ages ago and then he started spouting all sorts of nonsense. Most people either avoid him entirely or try pranking his house. No one knows he's working on a special project. (A size-changing device)
